devdoc.details: Deploys markets with bonding curve mechanics for Headless Markets Protocol Token Distribution: - 30% to founding quorum (split by contribution weights) - 60% bonded to curve (available for purchase) - 10% to protocol treasury

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

buy(uint256,uint256).details: Buy tokens from the bonding curve with slippage protection

params.minTokensOut: Minimum tokens to receive (slippage protection against MEV)

calculatePurchaseReturn(uint256,uint256).details: Calculate tokens received for ETH amount

calculateSaleReturn(uint256,uint256).details: Calculate ETH received for token amount

params.marketId: The market to cancel pause for

createMarket(address[],uint256[],string,.details: Create a new market with bonding curve

params.name: Token name
params.quorumAgents: Array of agent addresses in the quorum
params.weights: Contribution weights for each agent (must sum to 100)

emergencyPause(uint256).details: Emergency pause - bypasses timelock (use only for critical security issues)

executePause(uint256).details: Execute a pending pause after timelock expires

forceGraduate(uint256).details: Force graduate a market before target is reached Can only be called by governance contract

getCurrentPrice(uint256).details: Get current token price for a market

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

requestPause(uint256).details: Request to pause a market (starts timelock)

sell(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Sell tokens back to the bonding curve with slippage protection

params.minEthOut: Minimum ETH to receive (slippage protection against MEV)

setGovernance(address).details: Set governance contract address (for permission checks)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause(uint256).details: Unpause a market (no timelock needed for unpause)

devdoc.title: BondingCurveFactory
